name: stix
label: STIX
description: Structured Threat Information Expression, is a language and serialization format for exchanging threat information in cyberspace. Using this connector we can Extract indicators from the submitted STIX file and also Exports selected indicators from FortiSOAR in a valid STIX specification

operations.title: Extract Indicators From STIX File
operations.description: Extract indicators from the submitted STIX file. Supports STIX 2.0 and STIX 2.1

parameters.title: STIX2 File IRI or Name
parameters.name: file_id
parameters.tooltip: File containing the input in STIX2 format. You may provide the IRI if the file is uploaded to FortiSOAR, or the name of the file uploaded under /tmp on the server.
parameters.description: File containing the input in STIX2 format. You may provide the IRI if the file is uploaded to FortiSOAR, or the name of the file uploaded under /tmp on the server.

parameters.title: Process Response As
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.value: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: The Feed Data can either be returned as a JSON; written to a file on the FortiSOAR server; or Created as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.description: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being create as Feed records in FortiSOAR or returned in the JSON format (Return as a JSON) or being written to a file on the FortiSOAR server (Save to File). If you choose the 'Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR' option, then in Record Creation Playbook IRI field, specify the IRI of the Create Record playbooks IRI, else if if you choose 'Save to File' option, then in the Filename field, specify the name of the file in which you want to save the feed information retrieved from IBM X-Force.

Save to File.title: Filename
Save to File.name: filename
Save to File.tooltip: The file will be created under /tmp

parameters.title: Confidence
parameters.name: confidence
parameters.tooltip: Default Confidence score to be set for the feeds

parameters.title: Reputation
parameters.name: reputation
parameters.tooltip: Default Reputation to be set for the feeds

parameters.title: TLP
parameters.name: tlp
parameters.tooltip: Default TLP to be set for the feeds

parameters.title: Maximum Age (in Days)
parameters.name: expiry
parameters.tooltip: Default age for the feeds. The indicator expires on 'valid_until' date unless a different expiry is specified. If an expiry is specified, the indicator will be marked expired on valid_from + expiry.
parameters.description: Default age for the feeds. The indicator expires on 'valid_until' date unless a different expiry is specified. If an expiry is specified, the indicator will be marked expired on valid_from + expiry.

operations.title: Export Indicators In STIX Spec Format
operations.description: Exports selected indicators from FortiSOAR in a valid STIX spec, which can then be downloaded as a STIX file. Supports STIX 2.0 and STIX 2.1
